text: Two boys – R. Chandru (7) and K. Lokesh (7) of Kamarajapuram in Varushanadu in Andipatti block – drowned in a well in Varushanadu near here on Tuesday. The police said that the children, who went to nearby areas, were missing since last evening. After a search, their bodies were found floating in a rural well. The fire and rescue services personnel removed the bodies and sent it to Theni Government Medical College hospital for post mortem. Further investigation is on.
title: Boys drown
